name: Garbage Picker (RCBit)
description:
This game is submitted for My First Game Jam Winter 2022

Take the role of a garbage collector in an unnamed city and earn your keep by picking garbage and dropping them in garbage bins. But what happens if you're broke for two days straight? Well it's up for you to decide.

Description

Collect garbage on the streets to earn money. The day is ending fast so be sure to collect as many as you can  and drop them on the garbage bin before the day ends!

Controls

WASD - Movement
SPC - Collect/Drop garbage

Credits

Kenney to Urban RPG Pack

Beau Buckley for City 04 BGM

0x72 for the pixeldudesmaker tool
